param.name: Execution Frequency

param.name: Serial Port - Device

param.name: State Sampling Frequency
param.desc: Value of the state sampling frequency

param.name: Timeout - Error
param.desc: Number of seconds without data before reporting an error

param.name: Timeout - Failure
param.desc: Number of seconds without data before restarting task

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Fin effect minimum Meter Per Second value

param.desc: Fin effect Meter Per Second minimum value

param.name: Brake Margin
param.desc: Percentage of fin margin to use for braking

param.name: Maximum Rotation Rate
param.desc: Maximum rotation rate allowed by the servo

param.name: k roll
param.desc: k roll - Velocity dependent pitch fin effect

param.name: k pitch
param.desc: k pitch - Velocity dependent pitch fin effect

param.name: k yaw
param.desc: k yaw - Velocity dependent pitch fin effect

param.name: Entity Label - Servo Position
param.desc: Label of the servo position message to compute produced torque

param.name: Heading Rate Bypass
param.desc: Bypass heading rate controller and use reference directly on torques

param.name: Altitude Reference Margin
param.desc: Altitude reference marging to add above minimum altitude.

param.name: Heading Rate PID Gains
param.desc: PID gains for Heading Rate controller

param.name: Heading Rate Integral Limit
param.desc: Integral limit for Heading Rate controller

param.name: Maximum Pitch Actuation
param.desc: Maximum admissible fin actuation for the pitch controller

param.name: Maximum Pitch Reference
param.desc: Maximum pitch reference used by depth controller

param.name: Extra Pitch -- Vertical Error
param.desc: "Extra Pitch" is added to "Maximum Pitch Reference" if error to vertical reference is greater than this

param.name: Use Fixed Depth Offset
param.desc: Use a fixed depth offset to compensate for steady state error

param.name: Force Pitch At Surface
param.desc: Force pitching up at the surface

param.name: Pitch Angle At Surface
param.desc: Angle at which to force pitch at the surface

param.name: Heading Rate Open Loop
param.desc: Dispatch heading rate commands directly to servos

param.name: Error Attitude Compensation
param.desc: Compensate PID controller errors with vehicle's attitude

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Minimum DVL Depth
param.desc: Depth value below which altitude from DVL will be ignored

param.name: Minimum DVL Altitude
param.desc: Altitude value below which altitude from DVL will be ignored

param.name: Coarse Altitude -- Window Sizes
param.desc: Vector of window sizes for the moving averages

param.name: Coarse Altitude -- Upper Gap
param.desc: Size of the upper part of the corridor

param.name: Coarse Altitude -- Period
param.desc: Period for checking time spent outside the corridor

param.name: Coarse Altitude -- Ratio Time Outside
param.desc: Percentage of time outside the corridor to change corridor size

param.name: Coarse Altitude -- Sample Limit
param.desc: Limit of a fixed number of incoming samples per second

param.name: Roll Compensation -- Use Offset
param.desc: Use a fixed roll offset to compensate for steady state error

param.name: Roll Compensation -- Use Speed
param.desc: Perform roll speed compensation by changing proportional gain

param.name: Roll Compensation -- Speed Bounds
param.desc: Lower and upper speed bounds when doing roll speed compensation

param.name: Roll Compensation -- Speed Gain
param.desc: Roll's minimum proportional gain in speed compensation

param.name: Altitude Control -- Filter Weights
param.desc: Impulse response of the FIR filter used to smooth the depth reference during altitude control.

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Speed Tolerance
param.desc: Speed tolerance to consider possibility of submergence

param.name: Failure Time
param.desc: Time after which diving controller kicks in to help submerge

param.name: Time Step
param.desc: Time step between each increase in speed by diving controller

param.name: Speed Step
param.desc: Speed step when helping to submerge

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Additional Actions
param.desc: Actions to be added to remote actions list (comma separated in the form Action:Type)

param.name: Pitch Reference
param.desc: Desired pitch while remotely operating the vehicle

param.name: Maximum Heading Rate
param.desc: Maximum admissible heading rate to be commanded

param.name: Position of Horizontal Fins
param.desc: Fixed position for the horizontal fins while remotely operating

param.name: EstimatedState Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for the estimated state in case navigation fails

param.name: Force Torque Control
param.desc: Force direct torque control instead of desired heading rate

param.name: Disable Analog Thrust
param.desc: Enable or disable analog thrust over fixed increments

param.name: Maximum Thruster Actuation
param.desc: Maximum admissible thruster actuation while remotely operating

param.name: Hardware RPMs Control
param.desc: Hardware control of the motor's rpms

param.name: RPMs at Maximum Thrust
param.desc: End of scale value for RPM's at 100% of thurst

param.name: Minimum RPM Limit
param.desc: Minimum value admissible for desired RPMs

param.name: Maximum RPM Acceleration
param.desc: Maximum acceleration step to smooth speed ramp in mps control

param.name: Ramp Actuation Limit
param.desc: Ramp actuation limit when the value is rising in actuation per second

param.name: Log PID Parcels
param.desc: Log the size of each PID parcel

param.name: Control Frequency
param.desc: Control frequency (< 0 for event-driven EstimatedState processing)

param.name: Along-track -- Minimum Yaw
param.desc: Minimum yaw speed for track bearing convergence

param.name: Cross-track -- Distance Limit
param.desc: Distance threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Cross-track -- Time Limit
param.desc: Time threshold value for cross-track error

param.name: Position Jump Threshold
param.desc: Threshold for a jump in EstimatedState to turn monitors off

param.name: Position Jump Time Factor
param.desc: Relation between monitor disabling time and position jump

param.name: New Reference Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for new incoming path reference

param.desc: Enable or disable bottom track control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Forward Samples
param.desc: Number of samples for forward range moving average

param.name: Bottom Track -- Safe Pitch
param.desc: Safe pitch angle to perform bottom tracking. Reboot BottomTracker to update.

param.name: Bottom Track -- Slope Hysteresis
param.desc: Slope hysteresis when recovering from avoidance. Reboot BottomTracker to update.

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Range
param.desc: Minimum admissible forward range for bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- Check Trend
param.desc: Check slope angle trend in unsafe state

param.name: Bottom Track -- Execution Frequency
param.desc: Bottom tracker's execution frequency. Reboot BottomTracker to update.

param.name: Bottom Track -- Depth Avoidance
param.desc: Enable or disable obstacle avoidance during depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Admissible Altitude
param.desc: Admissible altitude when doing depth control

param.name: Bottom Track -- Minimum Depth
param.desc: Minimum depth to maintain during bottom tracking

param.name: Bottom Track -- FLS Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Forward Looking Sonar (FLS).

param.name: Corridor -- Width
param.desc: Width of corridor for attack entry angle

param.name: Corridor -- Entry Angle
param.desc: Attack angle when lateral track error equals corridor width

param.name: Extended Control -- Turn Rate Gain
param.desc: Turn rate gain for extended control

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Z Value
param.desc: Z value to maintain while executing this maneuver.

param.name: Z Mode
param.desc: Z Mode to use. One of Depth, Altitude or Height.

param.name: Maximum Pitch Variation
param.desc: Maximum pitch variation step when changing z direction

param.name: Cross Track Tolerance
param.desc: Tolerance in cross-track error to consider loiter has started

param.name: Number Of Turns
param.desc: Number of 360 degree turns until calibration

param.name: Loitering Radius
param.desc: Radius of loitering circle after arriving at destination

param.name: Vehicle Type
param.desc: Vehicle type (AUV or UAV), default AUV

param.name: Horizontal Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (XY)

param.name: Vertical Tolerance
param.desc: Minimum distance required to consider that the vehicle has arrived at the reference (Z)

param.name: Default Speed
param.desc: Speed to use in case no speed is given by reference source.

param.name: Default Speed Units
param.desc: Units to use for default speed (one of 'm/s', 'rpm' or '%').

param.name: Default Z
param.desc: Default z when no vertical reference is given.

param.name: Default Z Units
param.desc: Units to use for default z reference (one of 'DEPTH', 'ALTITUDE' or 'HEIGHT')

param.name: Time Gap
param.desc: Tolerance in time when reaching a new waypoint

param.name: Min Actuation
param.desc: Vehicle's minimum actuation for this maneuver

param.name: Max Step Actuation
param.desc: Maximum step in actuation applicable to compensate for delay/advance in trajectory

param.name: Loiter -- Minimum Radius
param.desc: Minimum radius for Loiter to prevent incompatibility with path controller

param.name: YoYo -- Maximum Pitch Variation

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of seconds to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports
param.default: EntityInfo, EstimatedState, Temperature, Salinity, Conductivity, Pressure

param.name: Transports
param.default: Announce, Abort, AcousticLink, AlignmentState, EntityParameters, EstimatedState, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, FollowRefState, GpsFix, IridiumTxStatus, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, ReportControl, Salinity, SoiCommand, SoiPlan, Temperature, TextMessage, TransmissionStatus, UamRxFrame, UamTxStatus, VehicleMedium, VehicleState

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Trace - Incoming Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding incoming messages

param.name: Trace - Outgoing Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding outgoing messages

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Set to true to announce the service

param.name: Transports
param.default: EntityParameters, EstimatedState, GpsFix, PathControlState, Heartbeat, LoggingControl, PopEntityParameters, PowerOperation, PowerChannelState, Pulse, PushEntityParameters, QueryEntityInfo, QueryEntityParameters, SaveEntityParameters, SetEntityParameters, SoundSpeed, VehicleMedium, LogBookEntry, ManeuverDone

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Trace - Incoming Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding incoming messages

param.name: Trace - Outgoing Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding outgoing messages

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Set to true to announce the service

param.name: Maximum Number of Tries
param.desc: Maximum number of tries for one requested message before throwing error.

param.name: Time Between Tries
param.desc: Time between tries for one requested message.

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Rate Limiters
param.default: AlignmentState:0.5, CpuUsage:0.2, Distance:0.2, EntityState:1, EstimatedState:2, FuelLevel:0.1, Rpm:1, SimulatedState:0.5, StorageUsage:0.05, Temperature:0.1, Voltage:0.1

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.default: CpuUsage:Daemon, Distance:Altimeter+DVL Filtered+Echo Sounder, Temperature:CTD+Depth Sensor+CTD Simulator, Voltage:Batteries+Rhodamine+Turbidity+Chlorophyll
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports
param.default: AcousticOperation, AcousticRequest, AcousticStatus, AcousticSystems, AlignmentState, CpuUsage, DevCalibrationControl, DevCalibrationState, Distance, EntityList, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedState, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, Heartbeat, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LblEstimate, LblRangeAcceptance, LblConfig, LogBookEntry, LogBookControl, ManeuverDone, OperationalLimits, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, PlanGeneration, PowerChannelState, ReportControl, RemoteActions, RemoteActionsRequest, Rpm, RSSI, SadcReadings, Salinity, SimulatedState, SmsRequest, SmsStatus, SoiCommand, SoiState, SonarData, StateReport, StorageUsage, TCPRequest, TCPStatus, Temperature, TextMessage, TransmissionRequest, TransmissionStatus, TrexObservation, TrexOperation, TrexToken, TrexPlan, Turbidity, UamTxFrame, UamRxFrame, UamTxStatus, UamRxRange, UsblAnglesExtended, UsblPositionExtended, UsblFixExtended, UsblModem, UsblConfig, VehicleMedium, VehicleState, Voltage

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Local Messages Only
param.desc: Only transmit messsages from local system.

param.name: Custom Service Type
param.desc: Optional custom service type (imc+udp+<Custom Service Type>), empty entry gives default service (imc+udp)

param.name: Identifiers
param.default: Green, Red, White - Back, White - Top
param.desc: List of LED identifiers (Names, GPIO number, etc)

param.name: Start Delay
param.desc: Amount of time to wait before start blinking LEDs

param.name: Critical Entities
param.default: Leak Sensor - Bottom, Leak Sensor - Antenna
param.desc: Entity names whose failures are considered critical
